subject: Vam pro
description_text:
Hello Simsonn.
I have problems with the VAM pro.

It works in the simsonn Manager  vibration test and frequency changes works.

Ingame it is not working.

Simhub don't see the VAM pro, other baseshakers worked good in simhub.

Please help else they are unusable.

Alex lampen
alampen@gmail.com

conversations.body_text: Hi A Lampen,     Our software currently supports 10 games. May I ask which game you are using now? We are continuously working to add telemetry support for more titles. In the meantime, you can use the internal version of SimHub that I’ve provided. The official release is still undergoing testing and may take a bit more time.   https://drive.google.com/file/d/1QrSbAvCC5iyx9XgdRgSQV-hWpmDGkujc/view?usp=sharing

Hi Simsonn,
Thanks for the quick response.
I mainly use LMU AC evo or F1 and the beta simhub workes perfectly thank u
for giving it.
I have different ssd storage for games and the simsonn manager didn't work
with my LMU install and simhub workes great.
The plus x set with the VAM pro on only 25-40% power is a dream now.

I'm looking forward to new products from simsonn.

Kind Regards,

Alex lampen




Op do 26 jun 2025, 11:30 schreef service@simsonn.com
Hi A Lampen,  We will improve the detection of the LMU installation path. Thank you very much for your valuable feedback.
